overview:
With over 10 years of commercial software development experience, Willem works at the intersection of research and engineering.

For the past 5 years he has been involved in taking promising research out of academia or industrial research and turning these into viable and robust commercial implementations. He has been associated with several companies, including Microsoft Research, Geomerics and Pneumacare.

Willem specialises in computer graphics, computer vision and image processing, and has written several papers and book chapters on these subjects with application to games and medical devices.
